name: Cavalier Geneve - This Blend is Undisclosed - Lonsdale
brand: Cavalier Geneve, This Blend is Undisclosed
additionalNotes: Cavalier Genève has announced a new event cigar, and it’s not disclosing the blend. “This Blend is Undisclosed” is the name of the company’s new 6 x 44 lonsdale that will be offered at retail stores during Cavalier Genève events. It will be offered in 10-count bundles. Beyond the relative lack of information about the blend, the cigar does not appear to use the piece of gold foil that is found on pretty much every cigar from the company.
